contents.text: Thank you for calling Carta, the equity management platform trusted by thousands of founders, investors, and employees.
Press '1' for Customer Support, including cap table management and equity questions.
Press '1' for Cap Table and Ownership Inquiries.
All of our equity specialists are currently assisting other customers. Please hold and we will connect you as soon as possible.

navigationGoals: I need to confirm and update my cap table after recent stock option exercises.
I’m a veteran and need to confirm my vested share percentage and ownership details in my cap table.
I need to validate my cap table after converting new SAFEs and correct any share misallocations.
I need assistance reviewing how many shares I own and my ownership breakdown.
Review my option vesting schedule and verify my ownership percentage after our latest funding round

contents.text: Press '2' for Tax Forms and Compliance Support.
You have reached our tax and compliance team. Please hold the line and a specialist will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: I want to obtain my annual equity tax documents and ensure compliance.
I need to obtain my Form 3922 for the stock options I exercised last year.
I want to download my 1099 and confirm how option vesting income is reported.
I need a copy of my tax forms related to my equity grants.
Clarify the necessary tax documents and withholding requirements for exercising my stock options this year

contents.text: Press '2' for Sales and New Account Setup.
Press '1' for Pricing and Plan Details.
One moment please, connecting you to a sales representative to discuss plan options and pricing.

navigationGoals: I'm evaluating subscription tiers and need pricing details for our team size.
I want to compare Carta’s pricing plans for my early-stage veteran-founded startup.
I'm comparing enterprise plan pricing, especially for board consent modules and per-user fees.
I’d like information on your subscription plans and their costs.
Compare the different subscription tiers and pricing for a startup on Carta

contents.text: Press '2' for Onboarding and Setup Guidance.
An onboarding specialist will be with you shortly to help set up your Carta account. Thank you for your patience.

navigationGoals: I need step-by-step assistance to onboard my company on Carta.
I need help setting up my new account and uploading my cap table.
I need guidance on setting up the API webhook to sync equity events with our HRIS.
I need step-by-step help to onboard and set up my new account.
Get step-by-step assistance to onboard my company account and import our cap table data
